name: Pixel Craft Survive
description:
Welcome to Pixel Craft Survive, a huge world of wildlife, evil dinosaurs, magical creatures and endless adventures!

To survive in these mysterious lands, you will have to tame wild creatures, from sweet and furry to the fiercest, to create high-tech and magical tools and build your base of cubes.

Thanks to a thoughtful character editor and an endless number of voxel cards and procedurally generated tasks, your adventure will be completely unique. Unite in tribes with friends or play alone. Build a huge fortress or explore the labyrinths of caves. Fly on a dragon and fight your enemies with your magic wand or ride a mighty tyrannosaur and shoot them from the rocket launcher. In the world of Pixel Craft Survive, you can adhere to any style of the game - if it allows you to survive!

FEATURES
- More than a dozen kinds of creatures: tame, train!
- Voksal system of construction.
Procedural-generated maps.
Procedural-generated tasks.
- A creative regime that allows you to build everything that your imagination has enough.
- Extensive arsenal of character creation tools and development system with skill trees and customizable characteristics.

We wish you pleasant game in Pixel Craft Survive!
